Text.val: 16.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
23.09.2002 JJ fixed range on CMON (was ranging on self instead of GNRL)
Program checks CMON against sums of DEBB balances
fetch totals from DEBB once for each client

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVARETENTACCH) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVARETENTACCC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVADISPACCH) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVADISPACCC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCH) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAEXTFINACCH) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAEXTFINACCC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DEBB where DEBB_ADMNO = :2 and DEBB_CLNTNO = :3
